Electric System Operation for the NonEngineer Course Cc The Electric System Operation for the NonEngineer course is scheduled to take place this Friday Saturday April th th from am to pm I have listed below a brief description of the course overview and location I can be reached at if you have any questions Location Meal Schedule World Trade Center am Coffee Bagels Served Mezzanine Level Oregon Room pm Lunch Served SW Salmon pm Drink Refreshments Breaks Every min Overview The twoday workshop provides you with a comprehensive understanding of system operations including fossil fuel hydro and nuclear generation transmission and distribution The course will provide not only technical information but also economics of operation system and equipment protection and safety Course Highlights Generation Transmission Overhead Distribution Systems Underground Distribution Switchgear Voltage Control Matching Generation Day one Day Two am am Coffee Bagels Served Coffee Bagels Served pm pm Generation Underground Distribution Construction and operation Padmount transformers underground of steam hydro and gas cable conduit and reliability overhead turbine generators versus underground Transmission and Overhead Swithgear Distribution Systems Circuit switches fuses and cut outs Power and distribution transformers Wye and Delta overhead Voltage Control distribution systems Voltage control using noload tap changers load tap changers and voltage regulators Power and energy calculations Matching Generation Automotive versus manual matching of generation to load transmission intertie Adjourn

be sent as follows National MS Society Portland Chapter NW Naito Parkway Suite Portland OR Phone How does this work for TEAM ENRON prizes IF my pledge form does not get turned in the day of the Event The TEAM ENRON deadline is earlier due to the key prize award of two roundtrip airline tickets on Continental Airlines In order to be eligible for this prize you must have ALL your pledges into the MS Timson which TEAM ENRON walker successfully raised the most dollars Judy will then contact the grand pri ze winner by phone Notification of the WINNING WALKER will be sent out via email to all registrants that provided an email address GOOD LUCK and continue collecting you could be the lucky winner of this wonderful pr ize I thought there were other incentive prizes what are they AND how am I eligible for those For every TEAM ENRON walker participating in the MS Walk your name will be in a drawing to receive one of the following prizes Overnight Hotel Package at The Benson Hotel Overnight Hotel Package at The Riverplace Hotel Overnight Hotel Package at The Marriott Downtown Hotel Overnight Hotel Package at The Marriott Residence Inn This drawing will take place on April The winners will be contacted by phone notification of these WINNING WALKERS will be sent out via email t o all registrants that provided an email address Are kids allowed to walk and is there a Prize for them Yes kids can participate in the Walk All kids will be eligible for a gift certificate to ToysRUs with one lucky winner taking home this gift certificate This drawing will take place on April The
